ðŸ’¡ How It Works:

1. Navigate to a LinkedIn post you want to analyze.
2. Click the white LeadShark icon in your browser.
3. Choose to export comments or reactions.
4. Hit "Export" (stay on the current tab while exporting).
5. Download your CSV file with valuable engagement data.

Note: Please use this tool responsibly and in compliance with LinkedIn's terms of service and privacy policies. LeadShark Comment & Reaction Exporter is designed to collect and export engagement data from posts you have access to view.

Privacy Policy & Terms of Use:
LeadShark respects your privacy and operates in full compliance with data protection regulations. We do not store or access any of your LinkedIn data. All information is processed locally on your device and is only used for the purpose of exporting post engagement data as requested by you. By using LeadShark, you agree to comply with LinkedIn's terms of service and to use the exported data responsibly and ethically.
